name: Ritual (itch)
description:
TW: THIS GAME CONTAINS SOME FLASHING IMAGES

"The first time I cut out a Trailing, I lived out a ritual that was very meaningful in and of itself. And I hoped that this same action would be lived with the maximum intensity by future participants. It was necessary that it be purely gratuitous, and that you not attempt to know--as you were cutting--what you were going to cut after nor what you had already cut." -Lygia Clark, Nostalgia of the Body

This is a local co-op abstract art maker. Make an abstract painting with a friend, acquaintance or enemy. One player controls the left side of the keyboard, one player controls the right side.

INSTRUCTIONS

  • LEFT CLICK to start
  • WASD to control brushes on the left
  • IJKL to control brushes on the right
  • Toggle left brushes with 1, 2, 3
  • Toggle right brushes with 8, 9, 0
  • SHIFT to switch to black background
  • CTRL to switch to paper background
  • SPACE to clear screen

NOTE: THE IFRAME MAY LAG CONSIDERABLY MORE THAN THE POP-OUT FULLSCREEN MODE (BOTTOM-RIGHT). THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION ALSO PERFORMS MUCH BETTER THAN THE IFRAME.

CREDITS

  • All sounds taken from freesound.org
  • Game made in Construct 2
  • All else by me.
